ИГРА ДЕТСТВА.
Моя первая КС. Один из моих первых шутеров. Играл в Source ещё в начале 2000-2010-х. Именно благодаря нему у нас есть GO. В общем, всё хорошо, игра классная, всем советую, у кого (мало ли) не идёт CSGO. Почти то же, только без скинов.

I mean its CS:GO but the graphics haven't been updated in almost 20 years

The best CS game to this day. This game is a total classic and has better gun balancing that CS: GO! It also has tighter knit communities and more interesting servers. Also moving half an inch doesn't completely ruin your weapon spread like in GO.

Passei horas jogando counter strike em lan houses na minha infância. Source foi o primeiro jogo que baixei quando consegui meu primeiro computador. Até hoje é o melhor jogo de tiro que ja joguei e ainda jogo. Vale cada centavo.
Instant classic. Not as good as CS:GO, but magic in it's own way.
